---
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
```
```{r}
x=1:10
y=-4:5
z=c("feb","mar","apr","may","jun","jul","aug","sep","oct","nov")
f=data.frame(x,y,z)
f
#assigning Names
f=data.frame(First=x,Second=y,Third=z)
f
#Dimensions
nrow(f)
ncol(f)
dim(f)
names(f)
rownames(f)
# Head & Tail Function
head(f,n=4)
tail(f)
# Specific Selection
f$First
f[1,3]
f[1:3,2]
f[c(1,9),2]
```
